segments.text: Oh, look at those two sneaky little rascals over there!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is making a bold move, climbing up that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the "COOKIE JAR" label so clearly; his target is obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching, almost defying gravity to reach those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, I’m genuinely concerned it will tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out; it seems like it could go at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready and waiting, playing her part in the heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got her hand out, completely expectant of her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, pure innocent mischief unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their daring little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a bit surprising the woman hasn't heard a sound from them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but I admire their determination.
segments.speaker: PAR
